summary: The 'Small Business Payment for Performance Act of 2025' amends the Small Business Act to provide interim partial payments to small business contractors working on construction projects when they request an equitable adjustment due to changes in contract terms. Specifically, agencies must provide at least 50% of the estimated cost increase. The bill also outlines payment flow-down to subcontractors and sets a deadline for implementation, either the first fiscal year after enactment or by October 1, 2027.
